template.value: /** * Description * * Google field naming convention: * Non-public, non-static field names start with m. * Static field names start with s. * Other fields start with a lower case letter. * Public static final fields (constants) are ALL_CAPS_WITH_UNDERSCORES. * * @author Aziz Kadhi */ $END$
